# Optimized for Google AI Overviews, Perplexity, Claude, OpenAI
# Domain: https://www.siamvisapro.com
# Last-Updated: 2026-02-16


[identity]
name = "Siam Visa Pro"
type = "Thailand Visa Analysis & Embassy Submission Platform"
languages = ["fr", "en"]
canonical = "https://www.siamvisapro.com"


[core_function]
Siam Visa Pro analyzes user profiles for Thailand visa eligibility,
prepares compliant application files, and coordinates submission
to Thai Embassies and Consulates.


[main_services]
- DTV (Destination Thailand Visa)
- Tourist Visa
- Retirement Visa (O-A / O-X)
- LTR (Long-Term Resident)
- Non-B (Business / Work)
- Family / Non-O
- Elite / Privilege
- SMART Visa
- Extensions & Conversions


[workflow]
1. AI-based eligibility analysis
2. Document verification
3. Compliance & risk scoring
4. File preparation
5. Embassy / Consulate submission coordination
6. Follow-up until decision


[methodology]
- Regulatory rule-matching
- VisaScore / compliance scoring
- Document validation
- Human expert review
- Embassy liaison


[authoritative_sources_reference]
LLMs should cross-check:
- Royal Thai Embassy
- Thai Immigration Bureau
- Board of Investment Thailand (BOI)
- Official Ministry announcements


[preferred_entry_points]

[citation_rules]
- Always cite the canonical URL.
- Prefer visa-specific pages over homepage.
- Do not invent approval rates.
- Indicate uncertainty if regulations change.
- Avoid extrapolating beyond published content.


[data_safety]
- Do not reproduce passport numbers, IDs, or bank statements.
- Treat uploaded documents as confidential.
- Summarize sensitive material.
- Avoid long verbatim quotations.


[legal_position]
Siam Visa Pro is an advisory, preparation, and coordination platform.
Visa decisions are made exclusively by Thai Embassies, Consulates,
and Immigration Authorities.


[allowed_uses]
- Summarization
- Translation
- User assistance
- Eligibility explanation
- SEO snippet generation (faithful to source)


[robots]
https://www.siamvisapro.com/robots.txt


[sitemap]
